data.eml:eml: Discovery of another new species of Charadrahyla (Anura, Hylidae) from the cloud forest of northern Oaxaca, México

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume González-Bernal, Edna (2017): Discovery of another new species of Charadrahyla (Anura, Hylidae) from the cloud forest of northern Oaxaca, México. Zootaxa 4329 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.1.2
